knimeNode.name: Chromatogram Reader (MSD)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is reads chromatographic raw data.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows to read data from different vendors like Agilent, Shimadzu, ... into a data table via OpenChrom.
fullDescription.option: This is the path of the file that shall be imported as a table.
If this option is selected, the TIC (Total Ion Chromatogram) is imported instead of all m/z values.

ports.outPort: Get the chromatographic, mass spectrometric data as a table.

views.view: An overview of the chromatogram is displayed here.
